name: Shift (itch) (Interspace1)
description:
Where are we and what's happening

Shift is taking place in a Spacestation that was recently hit by a abnormal wave of extradimensional energy. After you wake up you find yourself with noone around, the ship in critical condition and somehow you can switch between dimensions. Use your newfound ability to overcome obstacles and reboot the ships power and save it from falling apart.

Controls

Move: arrow keys or control stick/ d-pad

Jump: space bar or button south

Interact: x or button west

Shift: shift or right trigger

Menu: ctrl/esc or button north
